channel.title: Project Insanity Moving
channel.description: Hi. How do I move my Banks from old home to new home? Where are the bank current co-ords located so I can change em?

item.title: Project Insanity Moving
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

If it’s bankers you want to move (NPC’s) then look in spawn-config.CFG and add this

spawn = NPC_ID	COORD_X	COORD_Y	0	0	0	0	0	NAME

If its bank Object’s then look in your ObjectManager.java and search

public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {

Under that add

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(OBJECT_ID, COORD_X, COORD_Y, 0, 10);

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Moving
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

(IF) it’s delta, search… in client.java

“makeGlobalObject”

find your old coordinates from your old home, replace them with the new ones.

Ex.

       makeGlobalObject(*X-Coord*, *Y-Coord*, *Object ID*, 0, 10);

Read full topic
